name: Joshua

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: I offer graphic design services that turn your ideas into reality. Whether you need a new logo, branding materials, website graphics, or promotional content, I create designs that look great and communicate your message clearly. My goal is to make designs that not only catch the eye but also connect with your audience in a meaningful way.

services.title: Branding
services.description: I design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

aboutpara:
Hello! I'm Joshua Ledda, a web developer and graphic designer with a BS in Information Systems, majoring in Service Management Program. I am passionate about creating dynamic web applications, especially with React and Laravel.

I also offer graphic design services, where I create logos, visual identities, and more, blending functionality and aesthetics seamlessly.

resume.tagline: I'm a web developer and graphic designer.
resume.description: Detail-oriented entry-level developer passionate about web development and graphic design. Committed to creating efficient, user-friendly solutions. Quick learner dedicated to continuous improvement and eager to contribute to innovative projects.

experiences.bullets: Worked on different websites, including e-commerce platforms

education.universityName: Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University - North La Union Campus

training.activities: Finish 133+ assignments 2 exams and 1 capstone. | Able to create own libraries, query builder and MVC Framework from scratch.
Participate and Engage in the Ai Prompt Engineering Training | Participate and Engage in Advanced UI/UX Concepts Training | Participate and Engage in Web Fundamental Training

award.awardName: Proficient in Web Fundamentals (Village 88 Inc., Feb 2024)
award.description: Passed the exam in cloning a landing page of Abenson website using HTML and CSS only under 4 hours limit.
Passed the exam by coding both the front and back end of a given wireframe using Bootstrap, jQuery, Ajax, MySQL, and CodeIgniter within an 8-hour time limit.

award.awardName: Test of Practical Competency in IT (TOPCIT) Passer
award.description: Passed the  Test Of Practical Competency in IT (TOPCIT) examination in November 2023.
